#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
typedef unsigned long long int ll;
int main()
{
    ll t,n,i,j,count=0,a[1001];
    for(i=1;i<1001;i++)
    {
        j=i;
        while(j>0)
        {
            if(j&1)
              count++;

            j >>=1;

        }
        a[i]=count;
    }
    scanf("%llu",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%llu",&n);
        printf("%llu\n",a[n]);

    }

    return 0;
}
